snippet.title: Free Trader for the Atari 8-bit family
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

Apple II


Game description:

Free Trader is a space trading simulation, in which you travel from planet to planet and trade with the planets. You can then either import or export goods.

Sometimes a hostile space ship will come and then you have to destroy it, before it destroys you. The problem: You can not see the other space ship.


What I think:

If I would give scores in my rating, this would easily get a 5.0

The trading is fine, but the "duels" aren't. I HATE how I can not see the other space ship, but it can see me...also that warning siren....OH.MY.GOSH.
